Basic Spacing Variations

07123 456789
0712 345 6789
07 123 456 789
071 234 567 89
0 7123 456789
07 12 34 56 78 9
071 23 45 67 89
0712 3 456 789

With Country Code + Spacing

+44 7123 456789
+44 712 345 6789
+447 123 456 789
+44 71 23 45 67 89
+4 47 123 456 789
0044 7123 456789
0044 712 345 6789
00 44 7123 456789

Dashes/Hyphens

07123-456789
0712-345-6789
07-123-456-789
071-234-567-89
0-7123-456789
+44-7123-456789
+44-712-345-6789
+44-71-23-45-67-89
0044-7123-456789
0044-712-345-6789

Parentheses

(07123) 456789
(0712) 345 6789
(071) 234 567 89
(0)7123 456789
(0) 7123 456789
+44 (0)7123 456789
+44(0)7123456789
+44 (0) 7123 456789
+44 (7123) 456789
+44(7123)456789
0044 (0)7123 456789
(0044) 7123 456789

Dots/Periods

07123.456789
0712.345.6789
07.123.456.789
071.234.567.89
+44.7123.456789
+44.712.345.6789
0044.7123.456789

Mixed Formatting

07123-456 789
07 123-456-789
07-123 456 789
(07123) 456-789
(07123)-456789
(0712)-345-6789
+44 (0)7123-456789
+44(0)7123-456-789
+44 (0) 7123-456-789
+44-7123 456 789
+44 7123-456-789
0044 (0) 7123-456-789
(0)7123-456-789

Underscores

07123_456789
0712_345_6789
07_123_456_789
+44_7123_456789
+44_712_345_6789

Slashes

07123/456789
0712/345/6789
07/123/456/789
+44/7123/456789
+44/712/345/6789

Commas

07123,456789
0712,345,6789
07,123,456,789
+44,7123,456789

Brackets (Square/Curly)

07[123]456789
07{123}456789
[07123]456789
{07123}456789
+44[7123]456789
+44{7123}456789

Leading/Trailing Spaces

" 07123456789"
"07123456789 "
" 07123456789 "
" 07123 456789 "
"  07123456789"
"+44 7123456789 "
" +447123456789"

With Text/Labels

"07123456789 (mobile)"
"07123456789 (UK)"
"mob: 07123456789"
"mobile: 07123456789"
"M: 07123456789"
"Tel: 07123456789"
"Phone: 07123456789"
"07123456789 - mobile"
"UK: 07123456789"
"Call 07123456789"
"Contact: 07123456789"
"#07123456789"
"No: 07123456789"

Country Code Variations

447123456789 (missing +)
00447123456789 (00 instead of +)
++447123456789 (double +)
+440 7123456789 (extra 0 after country code)
+44 0 7123456789
0044 0 7123456789
+44 07123456789 (includes the 0)

Multiple Numbers (User Error)

"07123456789 / 07987654321"
"07123456789 or 07987654321"
"07123456789; 07987654321"
"07123456789, 07987654321"
"07123456789 & 07987654321"

With Names/Context

"07123456789 (John)"
"07123456789 - John Smith"
"John: 07123456789"
"Sarah 07123456789"
"07123456789 work mobile"

Extensions (Mistakenly Added)

"07123456789 ext 123"
"07123456789 x123"
"07123456789 #123"

Special Characters/Symbols

"£07123456789"
"@07123456789"
"*07123456789"
"~07123456789"
"|07123456789"
"\07123456789"

Unusual Spacing Patterns

"0 71 23 45 67 89"
"07 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9"
"071 2 345 6789"
"07 1234 56789"
"0712 34 56789"

Tab Characters/Multiple Spaces

"07123		456789" (tabs)
"07123  456789" (double space)
"07123   456789" (triple space)
"+44  7123  456789"

Case Variations (with country code letters)

"+44 7123456789" (standard)
"GB +44 7123456789"
"gb: 07123456789"
"UK 07123456789"

HTML/Special Encoding Issues

"07123 456789"
"07123–456789"
"‭07123456789‬" (with invisible unicode characters)

With Extra Digits (User Typos)

"007123456789" (extra 0)
"+4447123456789" (extra 4)
"071234567890" (extra digit at end)

Completely Non-Standard but Valid

"7123456789" (missing leading 0 entirely)
"44 7123456789" (+ missing from country code)
"+44(7123456789)" (whole number in brackets)
